org.openimaj.image.typography.hershey

Enum HersheyFont

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<HersheyFont>
      • org.openimaj.image.typography.hershey.HersheyFont
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<HersheyFont>, Font<HersheyFont>

    public enum HersheyFont
extends Enum<HersheyFont>
implements Font<HersheyFont>
    The set of Hershey's vector fonts.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
